item.title: IGS Classic Arcade Collection coming to PC in 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/igs-classic-arcade-collection-coming-to-pc-in-2025

  • PC

Eight classic titles developed by International Game Systems.

H2 Interactive will release IGS Classic Arcade Collection for PC via Steam in 2025, the publisher announced.

IGS Classic Arcade Collection, which includes eight classic games developed by International Game Systems, first launched for Switch on April 13, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via H2 Interactive:

About

IGS Classic Arcade Collection brings back eight beloved International Game Systems arcade games to Steam for the first time!

Relive the excitement of classic arcade action with up to four-player online cooperative play for select titles. Whether you’re a longtime fan or discovering these games for the first time, this collection is packed with nostalgic fun!

This collection includes multiple games from the Knights of Valour series, complete with online multiplayer cooperative support. It also includes popular arcade favorites such as Oriental Legend and Martial Masters.

Included Games

  • Knights of Valour: Super Heroes
  • Knights of Valour Plus
  • Knights of Valour 2: Nine Dragons
  • Oriental Legend
  • Oriental Legend Spooky
  • Martial Masters
  • Demon Front
  • The Gladiator

Key Features

  • Authentic Arcade Experience
    • The original game content has been completely preserved, and the fun experienced on the arcade machine has been reproduced!
    • The arcade style display perfectly captures the atmosphere of those days!
  • Online Multiplayer Support
    • For select titles, unite with up to three other friends or players online and conquer challenges together!
    • Pit your skills against players worldwide by competing for top scores on the leaderboards!
  • Indulge in Modern Conveniences
    • The games in this collection include difficulty options, allowing even novices to quickly get started.
    • You can also utilize the save/load anywhere function, letting players revisit challenges anytime.
    • For those who master the games, push your limits by challenging the highest difficulty!
